name: Event Generating Consumer
helpText: Consumers provide the 'glue' between the entry into the flow and the underlying technology generating the event. In order to create your own consumer you need to implement Consumer Interface.

componentName.helpText: The name of the component as displayed on diagrams, space are encouraged, succinct is best. The name should be unique for the flow. The name will be used internally to reflect the bean created.

endpointEventProvider.helpText: Set the endpoint event provider for this event consumer.
endpointEventProvider.validationMessage: Provide a java classname for the endpoint event provider bean.

managedEventIdentifierService.helpText: Set the ManagedEventIdentifierService for this endpoint event provider.
managedEventIdentifierService.validationMessage: Provide a java classname for the endpoint event provider bean.
